short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on YouTube video subtitles to instantly get definitions, translations, and examples. Works with selecting multiple words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on YouTube video subtitles to instantly get definitions, translations, and examples. Now you no longer need to pause a video and type each word into a translator. You can do it in one click! (Intended for those studying Russian by watching YouTube videos)
